posts.postText:
12:48 AM - RainRain: hey bro would nnjg accept a minecraft server donation
12:48 AM - RainRain: directly hosted by me so yeah
12:48 AM - ~Blue: uhhh, sure, but I don't play minecraft.
12:48 AM - RainRain: kay


Server be hosted by your's truley, And because im LAN (til i buy that wireless card on christmystas <3) im forced to use hamachi.

GUIDE ON HOW TO ENTER MY SERVER

1. Download Hamachi 

2. Turn it on (power button)

3. Hit network, then click join a network

4. in Network name, type RainRain's minecraft

5. in password, type uboa

6. Open minecraft

7. as IP, put 5.177.40.159:25565

8. click connect xd

  Once you connect to the network, you don't need to again, all you need to do is turn on hamachi
I'd play if I ever get smp to work :<
Maybe you have to download the newest client off minecraft.net

I'd join but I don't use Hamachi, and never will.


:''(
I plan to get a wireless card for my computer in a few months, at then we wont need hamachi.
